memberdef.name: SNDCTL_SYNTH_REMOVESAMPLE
memberdef.initializer: __SIOWR('Q',22, struct remove_sample) /* Reserved for future use */

memberdef.name: WAVE_FAST_RELEASE
memberdef.initializer: 0x80 /* bit 7 = Shut off immediately after note off */

memberdef.name: SEQ_ECHO
memberdef.initializer: TMR_ECHO /* For synching programs with output */

memberdef.name: SEQ_PRIVATE
memberdef.initializer: 0xfe /* Low level HW dependent events (8 bytes) */

memberdef.name: APF_NETWORK
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* Underruns probably caused by an "external" delay */

memberdef.name: APF_CPUINTENS
memberdef.initializer: 2 /* Underruns probably caused by "overheating" the CPU */

memberdef.name: SOUND_MIXER_RECSRC
memberdef.initializer: 0xff /* Arg contains a bit for each recording source */

memberdef.name: SOUND_MIXER_DEVMASK
memberdef.initializer: 0xfe /* Arg contains a bit for each supported device */

memberdef.name: SOUND_MIXER_RECMASK
memberdef.initializer: 0xfd /* Arg contains a bit for each supported recording source */

memberdef.name: SOUND_CAP_EXCL_INPUT
memberdef.initializer: 0x00000001 /* Only one recording source at a time */

memberdef.name: SOUND_MIXER_OUTSRC
memberdef.initializer: 0xfa /* Arg contains a bit for each input source to output */

memberdef.name: SOUND_MIXER_OUTMASK
memberdef.initializer: 0xf9 /* Arg contains a bit for each supported input source to output */

memberdef.name: MIXT_MARKER
memberdef.initializer: 12 /* Separator between normal and extension entries */

memberdef.name: EV_SYSTEM
memberdef.initializer: 0x95 /* MIDI system and real time messages (input only) */

memberdef.name: TMR_WAIT_REL
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* Time relative to the prev time */

memberdef.name: SEQ_USE_EXTBUF
memberdef.initializer: EXTERNC unsigned char _seqbuf[]; \ EXTERNC int _seqbuflen;EXTERNC int _seqbufptr

memberdef.name: SEQ_SYSEX
memberdef.initializer: {int ii, ll=(len); \ unsigned char *bufp=buf;\ if (ll>6)ll=6;\ _SEQ_NEEDBUF(8);\ _seqbuf[_seqbufptr] = EV_SYSEX;\ _seqbuf[_seqbufptr+1] = (dev);\ for(ii=0;ii<ll;ii++)\ _seqbuf[_seqbufptr+ii+2] = bufp[ii];\ for(ii=ll;ii<6;ii++)\ _seqbuf[_seqbufptr+ii+2] = 0xff;\ _SEQ_ADVBUF(8);}

memberdef.name: OSS_seq_advbuf
